cluster_information.name: Application Launcher
cluster_information.description: Provides an interface for launching applications on a Video Player device such as a TV.

attributes.name: CatalogList
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the list of supported application catalogs, where each entry in the list is the CSA-issued vendor ID for the catalog.

attributes.name: CurrentApp
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL specify the current in-focus application, identified using an Application ID, catalog vendor ID and the corresponding endpoint number when the application is represented by a Content App endpoint.
